p: In December 2019, Chinese researchers identified a novel coronavirus in humans that caused acute respiratory syndromeâ€”officially called coronavirus disease (COVID-19) as of February 11, 2020 [ 1]. China reported its first death on January 11, 2020, and Wuhan in the Hubei province, which was identified as the epicenter of the epidemic, was cut off by Chinese authorities on January 23, 2020 [ 2].
